Articles.Content:
Hello, and welcome to "Space Battleships and other Stuff.inc", which is also more well-known as the 17th Naval Fleet. This is an agency that composes of the entire naval space arm, and is dedicated to protecting Kerbin and her colonies. Our current ships are: "Interpid"-class Destroyer.

Interpid

This is the UKSSS (United Kerbin States Space Ship) "Interpid", an massive vessel with an single gun. I mean a single gun that is acclerated through and electro-magnetic field, and strikes its target at nearly 2.1 times the speed of light, which is enough to puncture through any type of armor. The "Interpid" is an starship, and has a range of 20 light-years, and a top speed of 90% light speed (But, topped with Abcluberrie Drive capabilites, it can go up to 11.5 times the speed of light.).

The "Interpid" has four engines, powered by the most advanced type of nuclear fusion, and has armor of very high strength. The ship is 50m long and has a very small crew capacity (Ten crew).

More to come.

Even if 2.1 times the speed of light was possible, anything even approaching 1x speed of light would obliterate whatever it crashes into. Hell, at 2.1x, I wouldn't doubt that it would create another big bang. *Sigh* I don't like to mess with FTL conversations... It's too insane. XD

Also, I don't know if you misspelled it by mistake or not, but it's the Alcubierre drive.

Post up more pics, it looks neato.
